entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 04:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -15.1°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
